lead_paragraph: Who knew there was a place in Manhattan called Paladino Avenue? We do, now, because there was a small fire this afternoon (stove fire, apartment 2A; no injuries; under control at 1:11 p.m.) at 50 Paladino Avenue in the Wagner public housing complex in East Harlem. The street connects First Avenue and the F.D.R. Drive near 120th Street.
snippet: Little-known street names in the news.
abstract: Little-known street names in the news.
